name: Blazing_Arrow
display_help: You fire a blazing arrow at your foe, dealing lethal damage. The flames wreathing the arrow cause the target to catch fire and sustain fire damage over time.

name: Shadow_Arrow
display_help: You fire an arrow of nether energy at your target. The target suffers smashing damage from the force of the blow and suffers negative energy damage over time, as the energy seeps into their soul. There is a chance that the target will be immobilized by this attack. There is also a chance that some of the spirit energy will splash on collision with the target, creating a pool of nether energy at the target's feet.
display_short_help: Ranged, Minor DMG(Smashing), Minor DoT(Negative Energy), Chance for Debuff(Foe)

name: Crystal_Arrow
display_help: You fire an arrow of crystalline nether energy at your target. This arrow pierces the target, causing lethal damage, while the frigid temperature of the arrow causes additional cold damage. This temperature has a chance of crystallizing vapor in the air around the target, giving a small chance of holding the opponent.
display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG(Lethal/Cold), Chance for Hold(Foe)

name: Entangling_Arrow
display_help: You fire an arrow which releases a strong net upon impact. This net immobilizes an affected target and brings flying targets to the ground. Additionally, there is a lingering loss of movement and attack speeds after the target is freed from the net.

name: Call_of_the_Pack
display_help: You call forth a Shadow Wolf to assist you in battle.

name: Damage_MN
display_help: The Spirit Stalkers are naturally resistant to several types of damage.

name: Damage_LT
display_help: The Spirit Stalkers are naturally resistant to several types of damage.

name: Damage_BS
display_help: The Spirit Stalkers are naturally resistant to several types of damage.

name: Damage_EB
display_help: The Spirit Stalkers are naturally resistant to several types of damage.

name: Damage_AV
display_help: The Spirit Stalkers are naturally resistant to several types of damage.

name: Dire_Howl
display_help: You unleash a dreadful howl that strikes fear into those arrayed against you. Affected targets suffer energy damage, then negative energy damage over time as the howl's influence takes effect. Targets also suffer reduced resistance to all damage types. There is a small chance that a target will be rendered afraid by the howl, but any target so affected cannot be made afraid again for a long while.
display_short_help: PBAoE, Moderate DMG (Energy), Minor DoT (Negative Energy), -RES(Foe, All), Chance for Terrorize(Foe)

name: Raking_Claws
display_help: You tear at your target with a vicious claw attack, causing lethal damage. Your target is left with wounds which cause additional lethal damage over time.

name: Shadowfire
display_help: You unleash a cone of dark fire from deep within, scorching all targets within a cone in front of you. These targets suffer both fire and negative energy damage, as the fire licks at the soul of the target. The target is also set ablaze, suffering additional fire damage over time.
display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG(Negative Energy/Fire), Minor DoT(Fire)

name: Touch_of_the_Beyond
display_help: You snap at your target, afflicting them with a painful bite that causes negative energy damage over time. This attack also decreases the effectiveness of healing on your target, an effect which is refreshed each time the target is bitten, until healing has no effect.

name: Raking_Claws
display_help: You tear at your target with a vicious claw attack, causing lethal damage. Your target is left with wounds which cause additional lethal damage over time.

name: Shadowfire
display_help: You unleash a cone of dark fire from deep within, scorching all targets within a cone in front of you. These targets suffer both fire and negative energy damage, as the fire licks at the soul of the target. The target is also set ablaze, suffering additional fire damage over time.
display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG(Negative Energy/Fire), Minor DoT(Fire)

name: Primal_Roar
display_help: You unleash a primal roar which strikes at the very heart of your opponents. This attack deals energy damage as the sound of the roar reverberates around you. The attack also reduces your opponents' resistance to all types of damage and leaves them suffering negative energy damage over time due to a loss of morale.
display_short_help: PBAoE, Moderate DMG (Energy), Minor DoT (Negative Energy), -RES(Foe, All),

name: Eviscerate
display_help: You tear at your target with a vicious claw attack soaked in nether energy, causing both lethal and negative energy damage. Your target is left with wounds that cause additional lethal damage over time.
display_short_help: Melee, High DMG(Lethal/Negative Energy), Moderate DoT (Lethal)

name: Pounce
display_help: You pounce into the air, tearing at all opponents in front of you. Affected targets suffer lethal and negative energy damage.

name: Soul_Rend
display_help: You snap at your target, ripping into their body with nether energy infused jaws. This causes lethal damage and negative energy damage over time.
display_short_help: Melee, High DMG(Lethal), Minor DoT (Negative Energy)

name: Maul
display_help: You slash at your target with your paws. This causes lethal damage and has a chance to knock your target back with the force of the blow.
display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG (Lethal), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

name: Natures_Fury
display_help: You rapidly snap at all targets in a cone in front of you, causing lethal damage with each bite to all affected targets.

name: Breath_of_the_Nether
display_help: You unleash a blast of nether energy at your foes, causing negative energy damage and terrorizing them.

name: Nether_Barrage
display_help: You unleash a powerful burst of nether energy in a cone before you, causing negative energy damage to all nearby. The intensity of this burst is enough to set opponents ablaze, causing additional fire damage over time.
display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Moderate DMG (Negative Energy), Minor DoT (Fire)

name: Thrill_of_the_Hunt
display_help: You call upon a pack of Shadow Wolves to assault a single target. These Wolves charge the target, attack it once and then flee.

name: Leader_of_the_Pack
display_help: You inspire yourself and your allies with a powerful howl, increasing damage, run speed and perception.
